title: FS: Tough back T206 Mattys w/ Carolina Brights, EPDG, Tolstoi...PRICE DROP!
author: jimivintage

posts.post_title: FS: Tough back T206 Mattys w/ Carolina Brights, EPDG, Tolstoi...PRICE DROP!
posts.post_content:
Hey guys,

A new business adventure is upon me, and I need help to fund it.  Serious inquiries only on the tougher backs.  Thanks so much!

Carolina Brights = $2,650  (If you missed out on the Mile High one, here's your chance!)
EPDG = SOLD!
Tolstoi = SOLD!
Sovereign 460 = $600
Sweet Caporal = SOLD!

Jimi

[quote name="jimivintage" post=1471855]Hey guys,

A new business adventure is upon me, and I need help to fund it.  
Jimi[/QUOTE]

Are you making a film, Jimi?? :D:D:D

I'm sorry, couldn't help it. :D 

Seriously, great looking cards! Best of luck with the sales!!

Steve

Still have these available with price drops!
I'll take Matty Tolstoi. Will be good to have it back in my collection. Thanks.
